#Humour #Photography #Nature #ChronicPain #ChronicIllness #Health #Science #Community #Education #Equity #Sustainability #Mindfulness

media_attachments.description:
A stand of Evergreen trees by a pond on a slightly cloudy day, seemingly like an island floating in space, the effect of being surrounded by blue cloudy sky above and that sky and trees reflected in the water in the foreground below the trees.
The trees and their reflection have a similar appearance to frequency wavelengths on an oscilloscope, maybe if you squint.

account.note:
Climate and water scientist and communicator. Interested in many things, including birds, mandolin, politics. You can also find my stuff (or message me) at www.gleick.com.
Author of a mess of scientific papers, the 9 volumes of The World's Water (Island Press); Bottled and Sold: The Story Behind Our Obsession with Bottled Water (Island Press); A 21st Century US Water Policy (Oxford); and my new book: "The Three Ages of Water."

content:
A reminder: the $75,000,000 Elon Musk has given to Donald Trump to buy political influence is chump-change to him. It's a tiny fraction of one percent (0.03%) of his net worth of $245,000,000,000.
Tax billionaires.

  #ÚltimasNotícias #Venezuela

content:
Miguel Almiron em boa forma na grande vitória de retorno para vencer a Venezuela nas eliminatórias da Copa do Mundo #ÚltimasNotícias #Venezuela

Hot News Parecia um grande jogo para Miguel Almiron e Paraguai na terça-feira (na madrugada de quarta-feira, horário do Reino Unido), quando receberam a Venezuela nesta partida da fase de qualificação para a Copa do Mundo. Já se passaram mais de seis horas de futebol desde que o Paraguai sofreu um gol, se ao menos conseguisse…

https://hotnews.pt/news-ve/miguel-almiron-em-boa-forma-na-grande-vitoria-de-retorno-para-vencer-a-venezuela-nas-eliminatorias-da-copa-do-mundo-ultimasnoticias-venezuela/

account.note: Our mission is to lead humanity's quest to understand the origins and prevalence of life and intelligence in the universe and share that knowledge. #SETI #arewealone

content:
#PPOD: Aringa Ora O Te Tupuna (The Living Face of the Ancestors)

Award-winning photographer Josh Dury captured this stunning picture of the Milky Way over Easter Island and some of its famous Maoi. From his Instagram post: "A truly unforgettable night from one of the darkest places on Earth, surrounded by a place and a community that is close to my heart. One of the most powerful, emotional moments of my life."

Credit: Josh Dury

#space #science #astrophotography

media_attachments.description: The Milky Way is a thick, dusty band almost parallel to the bottom of this image. In the foreground are at least four Moai statues on the hill side of Easter Island.

content:
You are doing your best, little human 🧡🍁.

#MastoArt #Comic #Autumn #Fall #Cozy

media_attachments.description:
Comic in four Panels.
First Panel. A woman with red curly hair is walking through an autumn scene. She is wearing a green jacket, a green scarf and a yellow backpack. An autumn leaf lands on her head, she looks surprised.

Second Panel.
She takes the leaf off her head and looks at it.

Third Panel.
Her hand is holding the leaf, it has  a little face now and says: „I beleaf in you.“ In this sentence „beleaf“ is written like in autumn leaf.

Fourth Panel.
The woman smiles and a little heart appears.
